mapper.sql: tsproductid, tsname, tsurl, tsdburl, tsdbname, tsusername, tspassword
mapper.select:
select
from tsproduct where tsproductid=(select tsproductid from tsuserproc where tsuserid =${tsuserid})
mapper.insert: insert into tsproduct (tsname, tsurl, tsdburl, tsdbname, tsusername, tspassword) values (#{tsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsdburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsdbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tsusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tspassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tsproduct
tsproductid,
tsname,
tsurl,
tsdburl,
tsdbname,
tsusername,
tspassword,

mapper.update:
update tsproduct
tsname = #{tsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tsurl = #{tsurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tsdburl = #{tsdburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tsdbname = #{tsdbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tsusername = #{tsusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tspassword = #{tspassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tsproductid = #{tsproductid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tsproduct set tsname = #{tsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsurl = #{tsurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsdburl = #{tsdburl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsdbname = #{tsdbname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tsusername = #{tsusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tspassword = #{tspassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where tsproductid = #{tsproductid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
